籤詩版本二:
Umnumzane akufanele anendaba nabantu abancane uma izinto zibheda uzodala uthuthuva.
Umsindo wepiyano kufanele ulalelwe nomngane oseduze.Kuhlala kuthule futhi kungacacile.Lo msebenzi owawo wonke umuntu.
詩意:
Le hexagram kufanele ihlangabezane nesithombe somngane oseduze.
Ukugcina izinto zingashintshi kuzoletha inhlanhla.
解曰:
Zhiyinfangxu. Unganaki ezinye izinto. Ziphathe njengomuntu ohloniphekile. Bonke bajabule.
I-Zhiyin Fangxu inezinhlamvu ezine, ezibhalwe ekuqaleni njenge-Shiyin Fanghua.
籤詩故事一:
◇BoYa uvakashela abangani (BoYa Broken Qin)
U-Boya, osibongo sakhe u-Yu, onikwe igama elithi Rui negama lokuhlonipha u-Boya, wayengowokuzalwa e-Yingdu, eSifundazweni SaseChu ngesikhathi seNtwasahlobo neNkwindla kanye Nenkathi Yamazwe Alwayo.
UZhong Ziqi wasebenza njengomgawuli wezinkuni eMbusweni wakwaChu. Ngolunye usuku, wahlangana noYu Boya edlala ihabhu eMfuleni iHan. UZhong Ziqi wezwa izwi lithi: “Lide njengentaba futhi linyakaza njengamanzi agobhozayo.” Laba ababili bashada futhi bathembisana ukuphinde bahlangane phakathi neMid- I-Autumn Festival ngonyaka ozayo.
Ngonyaka olandelayo, u-Yu Boya wagcina isikhathi esimisiwe njengoba kwakuhleliwe, kodwa u-Zhong Ziqi wayeseshonile. Ngemva kokuba u-Yu Boya ezwe ukuthi uZhong Ziqi ushonile, u-Yu Boya wacabanga ukuthi ngeke usaba khona umculo emhlabeni futhi wayengeke aphinde adlale ihabhu ekuphileni kwakhe.
ithi:
Ukuphula i-Yao Qin ne-Feng Wei Han. UZi Qi akanandaba nokuthi udlalela bani.
Umoya wasentwasahlobo uletha bonke abangani. Kunzima ukuthola umngane weqiniso.
聖意: Qaphela ngokuphuma komuzi wakho kanye neskhohlakali sakho.Lapho ufuna ingcebo qaphela ukuthengiselana.Kuyalulekwa ukuthi wephuze umshado.Akulungile kwabahamba ngezinyawo besifazane ukuthutha amasimu, izikelemu nemfuyo,ukuyofuna abantu ngokuzimisela. , ukumangalela nokufuduka, ukufuna impahla elahlekile ngokushesha, ukuvinjwa izifo, namathuna ezintabeni.
